Uses of Class
tools.concurrent.Scheduler

  • Packages that use Scheduler 
    Package Description
    tools.concurrent  

    • Uses of Scheduler in tools.concurrent

      Classes in tools.concurrent with type parameters of type Scheduler 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  SchedulerSet<S extends Scheduler>
      This class provides a fair time-wise distribution over multiple schedulers.
      Subclasses of Scheduler in tools.concurrent 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  SchedulerSet<S extends Scheduler>
      This class provides a fair time-wise distribution over multiple schedulers.
      class  SelfScheduler
      Most basic implementation of Scheduler.
      class  ThreadScheduler
      Scheduler implementation using a separate thread to execute the tasks.

      Constructors in tools.concurrent with parameters of type Scheduler 
      Constructor Description
      SchedulerEventObject​(Scheduler scheduler, SchedulerEvent event)
      Creates a new event object with the given source scheduler and event.
      SchedulerEventObject​(Scheduler scheduler, SchedulerEventObject cause)
      Creates a new event object with the given source scheduler and event cause.
      SchedulerEventObject​(Scheduler scheduler, SchedulerEvent event, SchedulerEventObject cause)
      Creates a new event object with the given source scheduler and event.
      SchedulerSet​(S... schedulers)
      Creates a scheduler set of the given schedulers.
      ThreadTimer​(long delay, long interval, Scheduler sched, java.lang.Runnable... rs)
      Creates a new timer which uses a separate thread to execute the given functions once every interval on the given scheduler.
      ThreadTimer​(long interval, Scheduler sched, java.lang.Runnable... rs)
      Creates a new timer which uses a separate thread to execute the given functions once every interval on the given scheduler.
